name: Animosity's Lost & Found GGJ2021
description:
Details:
You're an employee at YKEA. There is a sudden surge of customers looking for their lost items. Find the customer's lost item(s) before the timer runs out, we don't want negative Jelp reviews! Finding those lost items shouldn't be hard, right? Wrong! Your co-worked made it hard for you, the items can be anywhere.

Genre:
Puzzle

Context:
This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2021
